archimate:Driver.name: Wants design to be proactive, higher quality, standard, and traceable
archimate:Driver.documentation: Design should be proactive. Planning before doing is a cornerstone of our quality assurance with "Plan Do Check Act". It is possible to create higher quality designs, following standards which are traceable. Most architects miss the point that architecture modelling can make their life a lot easier. Architecture becomes reusable and silos can be broken down.
